author: @binederland
title: A Ukrainian war reporter‚Äôs story: Why I refused to make a ‚Äòdeal with the devil‚Äô
text:
- Illia Ponomarenko is one of Ukraine's best known war reporters.
- He has covered the Russia-Ukraine conflict since the annexation of Crimea in 2014.
His book"I Will Show You How It Was: The Story Of Wartime Kyiv" is out May 7.
Illia Ponomarenko grew up in the city of Volnovakha in Ukraine's eastern Donetsk region. He was a student at Mariupol State University in 2014 when war broke out in the Donbas, and Russia annexed the Crimean peninsula.
Ponomarenko told Business Insider, "We were patriotic, we were enthusiastic. We had the sense that the country was in our hands, and we wanted to make this country a better place following the revolution," referring to Ukraine's Revolution of Dignity, which ousted the pro-Russian president Viktor Yanukovych in 2014.
While Ponomarenko, 32, said he was unable to serve in the Ukrainian military himself due to medical reasons, he still wanted to help, so he picked up a notepad and pen and began reporting on the war.
Ponomarenko would go on to visit the front lines countless times, reporting first for a local paper in Volnovakha before joining the Kyiv Post. He would go on to cofound the Kyiv Independent in 2021.
He said he survived a number of close calls in the intervening years, including "the most dangerous two hours" of his life in May 2017 during a Russian mortar attack on Avdiivka.
Almost five years later, during the Russian siege of Kyiv, a tank shell struck the apartment building where he had been living at the time.
But still, Ponomarenko did not flee. Rushing to report from the front lines had never been a choice, he said, but rather a "duty" that he felt compelled to fulfill.
Since Russia's full-scale invasion in February 2022, Ponomarenko has become one of Ukraine's best-known journalists, with around 1.2 million followers on X, formerly Twitter.
His posts are an insight into the man himself: brusque, purposeful, and laced with humor.
His first tweet after Russia's invasion: "This is it guys. See you in victorious Ukraine."
This is it guys.
See you in victorious Ukraine.
‚Äî Illia Ponomarenko üá∫üá¶ (@IAPonomarenko)
[February 24, 2022]
'War makes people reveal their true selves'
Ponomarenko had a chance to leave Ukraine after Russia launched its invasion.
He hurried himself, his girlfriend Natalya, a couple of his friends, and his mother, who had still been living in Volnovakha when the Russians crossed the border, to his girlfriend's parent's house near the border with Moldova.
But something didn't sit right with him. "I'm a war reporter," he writes in the new book, "I Will Show You How It Was," which is due to be released on May 7. "I need to be with my military now."
A few days later, he returned to Kyiv, where Russian troops were rapidly advancing.
"This was the best and most correct decision of my entire life," he told BI. "I refused to make a deal with the devil. I followed my conscience."
Ponomarenko said he believes the war has "shown what ordinary people are capable of" and has helped reveal "their true selves," pointing to Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy as evidence.
He said he had always been slightly skeptical of the Ukrainian leader's reasons for becoming president and his behavior in office, thinking of him as a bit of a showman.
But he said the war had brought out the best in Zelenskyy and transformed him into a leader.
He added that the war had also had a marked impact on his mother, who had been staunchly pro-Russian prior to the invasion.
"She was among so many pro-Russian people who saw what they needed to see," he said.
Ukraine is taking serious losses on the eastern front, but they're not out of the fight, he said
Ukraine has faced a series of major setbacks on the eastern front in recent months.
In February, as the war entered its third year, Ukrainian troops
withdrew from the wartorn city of Avdiivka, an important strong point in defense of the country's logistical hub at Pokrovsk.
Since then, Russia has continued to advance in the surrounding areas.
Last week, a Ukrainian blunder
allowed Russian troops to advance and capture large parts of Ocheretyne, a village just to the northwest of Avdiivka, while the battle for Chasiv Yar, another crucial city in the Donetsk region, is also raging on.
Capturing it would put Russian forces within striking distance of Ukrainian operational and supply centers in the area.
Ponomarenko told BI the situation was "catastrophic."
"The six months of chronic, acute lack of defense aid, critical lack of munitions, manpower ‚Äì Russians are making use of this momentum," he said.
But, he added, "It's not an apocalypse. We're still in the game."
Kyiv and Bucha: Symbols of hope
Part of the issue, Ponomarenko believes, is that Ukraine has lost the sense of unity and togetherness that it had during the first months of the war ‚Äî "the rage of the doomed," as he calls it.
"All ethnic religious or social boundaries disappeared. A blue collar guy could stand next to a minister," Ponomarenko writes in the book.
But after more than two years of hard fighting, "the situation is naturally different today," he added. "Large-scale mobilization has had a significant strike upon the public morale."
Ukraine needs "a bit of the spirit from the battle of Kyiv, that outburst of patriotism, enthusiasm," he said. "It was a bright moment of pure bravery and hope."
Ponomarenko now lives with his girlfriend in Bucha, which became known around the world for
atrocities carried out by Russian troops.
The journalist recalled the first time he visited the city after Russia abandoned it, noting that there was a "feeling of evil" and a "smell of death" that stretched across the streets.
Human corpses, limbs, and dead dogs lay strewn on the ground. It was a "hellscape," he said.
At the time, some were convinced that Bucha would never recover, but returning citizens have helped revive the city with the assistance of a donation from the son of billionaire investor Warren Buffett.
Bucha right now
[pic.twitter.com/CUaTQ2qyih]
‚Äî Illia Ponomarenko üá∫üá¶ (@IAPonomarenko)
[April 28, 2024]
Now, Ponomarenko said he could smile while thinking about the city's peaceful streets, its blooming flowers, and the people strolling in its parks.
"Bucha was the greatest moment for me because it shows that life prevails," Ponomarenko said. "Life always prevails if only you fight on."
Business Insider

title: Highlands of the Smokies reopens after 2016 wildfires
text: By Sam Luther,5 hours ago By Sam Luther,5 hours ago Read in NewsBreak [Santa Cruz, CA](/santa-cruz-ca)25 days ago [New York City, NY](/new-york-city-ny)4 days ago UPDATE: Dog zip tied and dumped in Malibu Canyon very sweet and gentle but may have poor medical prognosis Wildfire prompts evacuation order for thousands in Northern California as ‚Äòexceptionally dangerous‚Äô heat builds in the West [Oroville, CA](/oroville-ca)15 days ago [Chicago, IL](/chicago-il)3 days ago [Los Olivos, CA](/los-olivos-ca)11 days ago [Kentucky State](/kentucky-state)9 days ago [Shenandoah, PA](/shenandoah-pa)9 days ago [Savannah, GA](/savannah-ga)2 days ago [Kentucky State](/kentucky-state)7 days ago [Tishomingo County, MS](/tishomingo-county-ms)2 days ago Welcome to NewsBreak, an open platform where diverse perspectives converge. author: Sergio Garc√≠a
title: La Bas√≠lica reverencia al c√°liz de Qaraqosh, el vaso sagrado que fue tiroteado por el Estado Isl√°mmico - La Nueva Espa√±a
text: La Bas√≠lica reverencia al c√°liz de Qaraqosh, el vaso sagrado que fue tiroteado por el Estado Isl√°mmico Este especial objeto protagoniza las eucarist√≠as por los cristianos perseguidos: "Es impresionante" Las eucarist√≠as celebradas ayer en la Bas√≠lica del Sagrado Coraz√≥n de Jes√∫s, conocida popularmente como la Iglesiona, ten√≠an un aura distinto. Primero, porque serv√≠an para recordar a los cristianos perseguidos. Y, sobre todo, porque contaban con un "invitado" de excepci√≥n, el c√°liz de Qaraqosh, que sufri√≥ un disparo del Estado Isl√°mico en Irak en 2014 durante la invasi√≥n del grupo terrorista a la Llanura de N√≠nive. "Es un testimonio de la persecuci√≥n a los cristianos en Irak, que muchas veces lleva consigo la vida, y vamos a rezar por ellos, a pedir al Se√±or que los ayude", proclam√≥ el rector de la Bas√≠lica, Manuel Robles, que reivindic√≥ el poder de la oraci√≥n, que "es omnipotente". "Movemos a nuestro Se√±or a que cambie muchas cosas", subray√≥ Robles. En la cita, impulsada por la Fundaci√≥n Pontificia Ayuda a la Iglesia Necesitada, se leyeron diferentes evangelios, con Irak en la cabeza y con el fat√≠dico episodio de 2014 en la retina. Un sacerdote hall√≥ el c√°liz de Qaraqosh entre los escombros y la Iglesia cat√≥lica siria lo don√≥ a Ayuda a la Iglesia Necesitada. El vaso sagrado, que no experiment√≥ ninguna restauraci√≥n desde que sufri√≥ el impacto de la bala, acaparaba buena parte de las miradas en la misa de las 12.30 horas. "Pod√©is ir en paz", proclam√≥ Manuel Robles antes de dar paso al momento que muchos esperaban, el de contemplar de cerca el c√°liz de Qaraqosh. El rector de la Bas√≠lica, acompa√±ado por el peque√±o Ignacio Bult√≥, sosten√≠a el vaso sagrado mientras una larga fila de feligreses aguardaba para ver el magullado c√°liz. Hubo quienes lo reverenciaron. Otros agudizaban la vista para no perder detalle de los signos de la bala que atraves√≥ el recipiente. Robles se√±alaba con el punto por el que entr√≥ el disparo y por el que sali√≥. Familias enteras se fotografiaron con el objeto protagonista de la eucarist√≠a, que a la salida del templo era la comidilla. Teresa Garc√≠a acudi√≥ a la misa con su hijo Luis Tejerina y su amiga Sara Llamazares. Los tres charlaban a las puertas de la Bas√≠lica sobre el c√°liz de Qaraqosh. "Es alucinante", comentaba Garc√≠a, sorprendida con el estado del mismo. "Cre√≠a que estaba solamente un poco da√±ado, pero es que est√° completamente destrozado por un lateral", sostuvo Garc√≠a, que ensalz√≥ el valor de la pieza. "Es un s√≠mbolo de la persecuci√≥n del Estado Isl√°mico a los cristianos por el hecho de serlo y del sufrimiento y la fidelidad de esos cristianos a Jesucristo", resalt√≥ Teresa Garc√≠a. Luis Tejerina, de 11 a√±os, tambi√©n qued√≥ prendado con el c√°liz, que escudri√±√≥ de arriba abajo. "Es impresionante", destac√≥ el cr√≠o, muy emocionado. Tras su estancia en la Bas√≠lica del Sagrado Coraz√≥n de Jes√∫s, el c√°liz de Qaraqosh pas√≥ por la parroquia de San Nicol√°s de Bari, en El Coto, por la tarde, y volver√° a Gij√≥n el 31 de agosto y el 1 de septiembre, pues estar√° presente en las eucarist√≠as de la parroquia de San Jos√©. author: Sreeju Sudhakaran
title: ‘Squid Game’ Season 2: From the Frontman’s Secret to That Mid-Credit Tease, 7 ‘Red Light’
text: Squid Game returns for a second season, this time with just seven episodes instead of nine. However, with Season 3 already greenlit, if you‚Äôre expecting Squid Game Season 2 to offer a proper conclusion, you‚Äôll be sorely disappointed. While the Netflix Korean show remains thrilling and compelling, continuing to showcase the manic downfall of humanity when faced with desperation, the Season 2 finale feels more like a mid-season break than a satisfying conclusion. ‚ÄòSquid Game‚Äô Season 2 Review: High-Stakes Thrills, Performances and Gong Yoo‚Äôs Standout Cameo Make for a Worthy but Flawed Netflix Sequel. Before diving into the details, let‚Äôs recap what Season 2 is all about. Gi-hun, using his prize money from the first season, dedicates all his resources to ending the Squid Games. He teams up with Jun-ho, the police officer and younger brother of Hwang In-ho (aka The Frontman), who is equally determined to uncover the island‚Äôs location and confront his estranged sibling. Jun-ho, however, keeps his familial connection a secret from Gi-hun. Eventually, Gi-hun manages to secure a meeting with The Frontman and convinces him to allow his re-entry into the games. Gi-hun finds himself back on the frontline for another round of deadly competitions, this time joined by a new set of players, including his friend Jung-bae. Despite Gi-hun‚Äôs desperate attempts to warn his fellow contestants about the gravity of their situation, his words fall on deaf ears in the face of their greed and desperation. To make matters worse - though Gi-hun is unaware of it till the end - The Frontman infiltrates the player camp, disguising himself as a contestant with the 001 tag, befriending Gi-hun and even helping him out of tricky situations. SPOILERS AHEAD: The season finale sees Gi-hun and his few brave allies, including The Frontman, launching an attack on the Squid Game employees who come to suppress a bloody riot. They seize weapons and attempt to storm the game‚Äôs management office. However, The Frontman betrays them, pretending to be killed in action during the chaos. Several of Gi-hun‚Äôs comrades are either killed during the assault or while surrendering. In the final, devastating moments, The Frontman - now masked - shoots Jung-bae dead right in front of Gi-hun, leaving him crying helplessly. It‚Äôs a bleak conclusion to a season that offers little resolution and leaves many questions unanswered. Below, we explore seven burning questions that Squid Game Season 3, set to drop in 2025, needs to address. 1. Why Did In-ho Infiltrate the Players? [caption id="attachment_6520867" align="alignnone" width="2048"] A Still From Squid Game Season 2[/caption] The Frontman‚Äôs motivations for infiltrating the player camp, becoming a contestant himself, and befriending Gi-hun are never clearly explained. By shooting Jung-bae in front of Gi-hun, he seems intent on teaching him the consequences of being a hero. However, the elaborate setup feels unnecessarily contrived, as there were simpler ways to convey this message outside the games. Could it be that, with Oh Il-nam gone, In-ho feels the need to symbolically take his place as Player 001? 2. What‚Äôs Squid Game Planning to Do With Gi-hun? [caption id="attachment_6520865" align="alignnone" width="2048"] A Still From Squid Game Season 2[/caption] Gi-hun‚Äôs fate is left hanging at the end of the season, though it‚Äôs safe to assume he survives as the show‚Äôs protagonist. But what exactly do the organisers plan to do with him now that his revolt has been crushed? Will they eject him from the games forcing him to reunite with Jun-ho, or make him to compete again with a now antagonised section of players and more dangerous games? If the latter happens, he has no friends to back on now. 3. Did In-ho Save Jun-ho? [caption id="attachment_6520869" align="alignnone" width="1678"] A Still From Squid Game Season 2[/caption] In-ho‚Äôs decision to shoot his brother in the shoulder rather than fatally injure him at the end of Season 1 feels deliberate, suggesting he wants Jun-ho alive. Season 2 reveals that Sea Captain Park, who sabotages Jun-ho‚Äôs team‚Äôs efforts to locate the island, is likely working for the Squid Game organisers. Could In-ho have arranged for the captain to rescue Jun-ho after his fall into the water? Is there a trace of humanity left in In-ho despite his monstrous role in the games? We also hope that Jun-ho, who was almost useless the whole season, figure out the Captain's treachery and the island's true whereabouts through him. 4. Will the Clients Return? [caption id="attachment_6520863" align="alignnone" width="1946"] A Still From Squid Game Season 1[/caption] To destroy the Squid Game, Gi-hun and Jun-ho must tackle its demand, which means taking down the mysterious, masked clients. These wealthy, depraved spectators were notably absent in Season 2. Will they return in Season 3 to face their reckoning? ‚ÄòSquid Game‚Äô 3 Confirmed! Lee Jung-Jae Announces Netflix Drama‚Äôs Third Season on ‚ÄòTonight Show With Jimmy Fallon‚Äô. 5. Did Gyeong-seok Survive? [caption id="attachment_6520866" align="alignnone" width="1846"] A Still From Squid Game Season 2[/caption] Gyeong-seok, one of Gi-hun‚Äôs allies, surrenders during the final assault. While his associate is executed, Gyeong-seok pleads for his life, mentioning his sick daughter. Though it appears the masked employee shoots him, it‚Äôs possible he survived. If the shooter was No-eul, and we feel it's her, it‚Äôs likely she intentionally aimed for his shoulder, planning to smuggle him to safety using the organ-harvesting operation as a cover. 6. What Happened to Dae-ho? [caption id="attachment_6520868" align="alignnone" width="2048"] A Still From Squid Game Season 2[/caption] Dae-ho, a former Marine, experiences a breakdown during the climactic fight, refusing to shoot anyone and retreating to the player quarters in tears. Earlier in the season, his hesitation when questioned about his time in the Marines hints at a traumatic past. What happened to him during his service, and how does it tie into his inability to act during the climax? 7. What‚Äôs the Mid-Credit Scene Teasing? [caption id="attachment_6520864" align="alignnone" width="2048"] A Still From Squid Game Season 2[/caption] The brief mid-credit scene shows players 096, 100, and 353 entering an arena with two giant dolls: the familiar female one and a new male counterpart. This appears to be a modified version of the Red Light, Green Light game. Considering the high casualty rate of the original version, introducing a second doll suggests an even bloodier massacre. How will this new iteration of the game work, and what strategies will players adopt to survive?

author: lad3
title: Gov. Josh Shapiro Proclaims November 18-22, 2024 Rural Health Week in Pennsylvania | Pennsylvania Office of Rural Health
text: In an effort to draw attention to the wide range of issues that impact rural health, Gov. Josh Shapiro has declared November 18-22, 2024, as Rural Health Week in Pennsylvania at the request of the Pennsylvania Rural Health Association (PRHA) and the Pennsylvania Office of Rural Health (PORH). Gov. Shapiro made the proclamation to promote awareness of the full range of issues that impact rural health care throughout the Commonwealth and the health status of rural Pennsylvanians. Nationally, Pennsylvania ranks as one of the states with the highest number of rural residents, with 26 percent of Pennsylvanians residing in rural areas. In recognition of Pennsylvania‚Äôs diverse rural needs, the Commonwealth has supported the development of the Center for Rural Pennsylvania, the Pennsylvania Office of Rural Health, and other agencies and initiatives to address the needs of rural Pennsylvanians. The week encompasses November 21, which is National Rural Health Day, established in 2011 by the National Organization of State Offices of Rural Health (NOSORH) to showcase rural America; increase awareness of rural health issues; and promote the efforts of NOSORH, State Offices of Rural Health (SORHs) and others in addressing those issues. ‚ÄúNearly 59.5 million Americans, including 3.4 million Pennsylvanians, live in rural communities,‚Äù said Lisa Davis, PORH director and outreach associate professor of health policy and administration at Penn State. ‚ÄúThese small towns and communities continue to be fueled by the creative energy of citizens who step forward to provide a wealth of products, resources, and services. Rural communities also face unique health care concerns: a lack of providers; accessibility issues, particularly in terms of transportation and technology; and affordability issues as the result of larger percentages of uninsured and underinsured citizens and greater out-of-pocket health costs. Rural hospitals and health care providers, which frequently are the economic backbone of the communities they serve, deserve special consideration so that they can continue to provide high-quality services and meet the needs of rural residents.‚Äù To celebrate the work being done to achieve health care access and equity in Pennsylvania, PORH will present Pennsylvania Rural Health Awards during virtual ceremonies across rural Pennsylvania. PORH was established in 1991 to enhance the health status of rural Pennsylvanians and strengthen the delivery and quality of care in the communities in which they live. Each year, the organization presents awards to recognize rural health programs and individuals who have made substantial contributions to rural health in Pennsylvania. To learn more about the Pennsylvania Office of Rural Health, visit porh.psu.edu. PRHA is dedicated to enhancing the health and well-being of Pennsylvania‚Äôs rural citizens and communities. Through the combined efforts of individuals, organizations, professionals, and community leaders, the Association is a collective voice for rural health issues and a conduit for information and resources. More information can be found at paruralhealth.org.

author: @gurufocus
title: Karman Holdings Inc (KRMN) Unveils New Clean Room for Spacecraft Assembly
text:
Karman Holdings Inc (KRMN, Financial), a leader in the design and manufacturing of mission-critical subsystems for space and defense, announced the grand opening of a new clean room at its Washington facility. This purpose-built space is designed for the integration of lunar landers, spacecraft, habitat modules, and satellites, reinforcing Karman's commitment to supporting major space programs. The announcement, made on October 24, 2023, highlights the company's investment in advanced technology to meet the fast-paced demands of the growing space industry.
Positive Aspects
- The new clean room adheres to stringent ISO aerospace standards, ensuring optimal conditions for spacecraft assembly and integration.
- Equipped with overhead lifting capabilities for multiple tons and a large entryway, the facility can accommodate large spacecraft.
- Karman's investment streamlines the supply chain, enhances efficiency, and accelerates project timelines.
- The facility positions Karman as a trusted partner for future space and defense missions.
Negative Aspects
- The press release includes forward-looking statements, which are subject to risks and uncertainties that could affect actual outcomes.
- Dependence on U.S. military contracts, which are subject to competitive bidding and budget constraints, poses potential revenue risks.
Financial Analyst Perspective
From a financial standpoint, Karman Holdings Inc's investment in a new clean room is a strategic move to enhance its capabilities in the space sector. This development could potentially lead to increased revenue streams by attracting more contracts from both government and commercial entities. However, the reliance on U.S. military contracts and the inherent risks associated with forward-looking statements should be carefully monitored by investors.
Market Research Analyst Perspective
The opening of the new clean room by Karman Holdings Inc reflects the growing demand for advanced space systems and the need for state-of-the-art facilities to support this expansion. As the space industry continues to evolve, companies like Karman that invest in cutting-edge technology and infrastructure are likely to gain a competitive edge. This move not only strengthens Karman's market position but also aligns with the broader trend of increased investment in space exploration and defense.
Frequently Asked Questions
What is the purpose of the new clean room?
The clean room is designed for the integration of lunar landers, spacecraft, habitat modules, and satellites.
What standards does the clean room adhere to?
The facility adheres to stringent ISO aerospace standards.
What are the capabilities of the new clean room?
It features overhead lifting capabilities for multiple tons and a large entryway to support large spacecraft.
How does this investment benefit Karman Holdings Inc?
It streamlines the supply chain, enhances efficiency, accelerates project timelines, and positions Karman as a trusted partner for future missions.
 Read the original press release here.
This article, generated by GuruFocus, is designed to provide general insights and is not tailored financial advice. Our commentary is rooted in historical data and analyst projections, utilizing an impartial methodology, and is not intended to serve as specific investment guidance. It does not formulate a recommendation to purchase or divest any stock and does not consider individual investment objectives or financial circumstances. Our objective is to deliver long-term, fundamental data-driven analysis. text: Fonte : lanazione di 13 set 2024 Beko sciopero e presidio a Siena | Vogliamo risposte e garanzie Beko, sciopero e presidio a Siena: "Vogliamo risposte e garanzie" (Di venerd√É¬¨ 13 settembre 2024) sciopero di due ore tra la fine del primo e l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢inizio del secondo turno e presidio davanti alla fabbrica. Hanno incrociato le braccia e gridato la loro preoccupazione i 299 lavoratori dello stabilimento senese di Beko Europe, dove ieri √É¬® iniziata la √¢‚Ç¨≈ìstagione della mobilitazione√¢‚Ç¨≈ì. A fronte dell√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢improvvisa chiusura di due siti produttivi in Polonia e del trasferimento della produzione in Turchia, √É¬® scattata la protesta per le ripercussioni che tali provvedimenti avranno sul territorio nazionale. In attesa di un nuovo incontro al ministero delle Imprese e del made in Italy, alla luce del "silenzio assordante" opposto dalla multinazionale alle ripetute richieste di condivisione del piano industriale presentate dai sindacati, ieri la produzione si √É¬® fermata in tutti i cinque stabilimenti italiani. Garanzie sul futuro" - Sono certa che il piano industriale c√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢√É¬®, ma certe strategie sono l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢antipasto di quello che ci verr√É servito, per questo vogliamo mostrare che in Italia certe cose non si possono fare". L√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢azienda deve dirci cosa vuole fare in Italia con chiarezza. I fatti avvenuti in Polonia, dove 1. E√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢ il momento". Daniela Miniero, segretaria Fiom Cgil, affiancata dalla segretaria generale Alice D√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢Ercole, ha lanciato un ultimatum: "Questo √É¬® solo l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢inizio. lanazione Beko, l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢urlo dei 300. Sciopero e presidio: "E√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢ solo il primo passo. Garanzie sul futuro" - Al via la mobilitazione nello stabilimento di viale Toselli tra bandiere e canti: "La gente come noi non molla mai", √É¬® il messaggio all√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢azienda. La Regione convoca il tavolo di crisi l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢8 ottobre, ness ... lanazione Beko Europe, altissima adesione allo sciopero nazionale oltre il 90% - Le segreterie nazionali di Fiom, Fim e Uilm annunciano che in assenza di risposte proseguiranno con la mobilitazione. Sabato a Cassinetta presidio e sciopero degli straordinari indetto dai delegati de ... varesenews Beko, sciopero davanti allo stabilimento senese. √¢‚Ç¨≈ìVogliamo risposte√¢‚Ç¨ÔøΩ - La protesta a fronte dell√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢improvvisa chiusura di due siti produttivi in Polonia e del trasferimento della produzione in Turchia ... msn Video di Tendenza Video Beko sciopero Video Beko sciopero ¬© Articolo pubblicato secondo le condizioni dell' Autore. author: /cronologia/-/meta/jairo-martinez-garay
title: Samira Mendoza y Julio Rodr√≠guez se unen en amor y legalidad
text: [Boda civil](/cronologia/-/meta/boda-civil) SAN PEDRO SULA. Inundados de amor, respeto y admiraci√≥n, as√≠ realizaron su enlace nupcial civil: Samira Suheyla Mendoza Kunkar y Julio C√©sar Rodr√≠guez Rodr√≠guez, quienes fueron acompa√±ados por sus seres queridos. Silvia Kunkar Kafatti y H√©ctor Iv√°n Mendoza Mej√≠a, padres de la novia; as√≠ como la madre del novio, Reina Caballero fueron parte de la uni√≥n, compartiendo la desbordante felicidad por el logro de vida de sus reto√±os. Asimismo, desde el cielo, el padre de Julio, el recordado Armando Rodr√≠guez (q.d.D.g.) seguramente sonri√≥ al ver contento y enamorado a su amado hijo. LEA AQU√ç: [Carlos Rodr√≠guez y Nory Collins celebran su amor ante la ley](https://www.laprensa.hn/sociales/carlos-rodriguez-nory-collins-celebran-amor-boda-matrimonio-civil-sps-EB17612732#image-1) Tras siete a√±os de noviazgo, lleg√≥ el esperado momento. Los tiempos de Dios son perfectos, y en febrero del 2024 se dio. Samira y Julio se casaron ante los ojos de sus m√°s cercanos amigos y familia, en un evento llevado a cabo en el Restaurante El Portal de las Carnes. La ceremonia nupcial fue dirigida por el abogado Josu√© Henr√≠quez, quien despu√©s de leer los puntos sobre el contrato civil efectuado, procedi√≥ a unirlos ante la ley hondure√±a, en el marco del respeto, igualdad y la ayuda mutua. Asimismo, los testigos de la uni√≥n civil fueron Carolina Rodr√≠guez y Rams√©s Urrutia, ambos siendo los responsables de certificar la voluntad que fluye entre los novios, siendo un acto m√°s protocolario ante la notoriedad de la esencia rom√°ntica de la pareja. ADEM√ÅS: [Una promesa de amor ante Dios entre Emma Mej√≠a y Roger Valladares](https://www.laprensa.hn/sociales/promesa-amor-dios-emma-mejia-roger-valladares-boda-copantl-sps-JH17546429) La decoraci√≥n de la ceremonia fue obra de Marcela Cueva y su equipo, creando una atm√≥sfera rom√°ntica r√∫stica, bajo el predominio de los elementos propios de la naturaleza. Los invitados al festejo extendieron sus muestras de cari√±o a los protagonistas de una historia de amor que no estima un final para su v√≠nculo sempiterno. Boda eclesi√°stica. Samira Mendoza, m√©dica de profesi√≥n, y Julio Rodr√≠guez, manager de la ‚ÄúBanda fiesta‚Äù, La Vers√°til, se casar√°n por la iglesia el pr√≥ximo 6 de abril.

author: El Universal
title: What If...?: fans est√°n amando a la nueva hero√≠na nativa americana
text:
Tomatazos What If...?: fans est√°n amando a la nueva hero√≠na nativa americana Leer todo el art√≠culo Sofi Terracota 28 de diciembre de 2023, 9:35 p. m. ¬∑ 4 min de lectura What If...?: fans est√°n amando a la nueva hero√≠na nativa americana
Los cap√≠tulos de What If...? (82%) contin√∫an llegando a Disney Plus y este jueves se estren√≥ en la plataforma " What If... Hela Found the Ten Rings? ", el s√©ptimo de la segunda temporada. La serie se ha llevado buenos comentarios en general, pero el m√°s reciente episodio ha dejado encantados a los fans ante la aparici√≥n de Kahhori, una superhero√≠na nativa americana que llega pisando fuerte al MCU y que el p√∫blico ya est√° pidiendo para el terreno del live-action.
No te pierdas: Donald Trump dice que le rogaron para aparecer en Mi pobre angelito 2
La premisa central de la serie se basa en explorar escenarios alternativos dentro del vasto multiverso de Marvel, planteando preguntas intrigantes como "¬øY si Peggy Carter se convirtiera en la Capitana Carter en lugar de Steve Rogers?" o "¬øY si T'Challa fuera Star-Lord en lugar de Peter Quill?". Cada episodio presenta una realidad alternativa donde eventos clave toman rutas divergentes, desencadenando cambios significativos en el universo Marvel que los fan√°ticos conocen. La serie ofrece una nueva perspectiva sobre personajes ic√≥nicos y eventos, permitiendo a los espectadores sumergirse en narrativas innovadoras y creativas que exploran las posibilidades infinitas del multiverso.
Ver Video
A trav√©s de la animaci√≥n, What If...? permite una expresi√≥n visual √∫nica y creativa, liber√°ndose de las limitaciones de la acci√≥n en vivo y llevando a los espectadores a mundos imaginativos. Cada episodio se presenta como una narrativa independiente, pero todos est√°n conectados por la presencia de The Watcher (El Vigilante), un ser c√≥smico que observa estos universos alternativos. La serie ofrece una experiencia fresca y √∫nica para los fan√°ticos de Marvel al desafiar las expectativas y explorar historias que, de otra manera, no podr√≠an haber sido contadas en el universo cinematogr√°fico tradicional.
Te invitamos a leer: Quer√≠a m√°s comedia: James Gunn renuncia a DC tras diferencias creativas
Continuar leyendo la historia El nuevo cap√≠tulo de What If‚Ä¶? nos presenta a Kahhori, la primera hero√≠na Mohawk del MCU. Su dise√±o y poderes han resultado tan espectaculares que los fans han tomado las redes sociales para rendir los correspondientes honores y alabanzas a esta figura, misma que tiene el potencial para convertirse no s√≥lo en una preferida de la temporada, tambi√©n de todo Marvel. Puedes ver algunos de los comentarios m√°s abajo.
Ver Video
El √©xito del Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) puede atribuirse a una combinaci√≥n √∫nica de factores que han transformado la forma en que se cuentan las historias en el cine y han cautivado a audiencias de todo el mundo. En primer lugar, la meticulosa planificaci√≥n y ejecuci√≥n de un universo compartido, donde las pel√≠culas est√°n interconectadas, permiten que los personajes y las tramas se desarrollen de manera coherente a lo largo de m√∫ltiples pel√≠culas. Este enfoque narrativo ampliado ha generado una experiencia cinematogr√°fica inmersiva y continua, fomentando la fidelidad de los fan√°ticos y atrayendo tanto a seguidores de c√≥mics de toda la vida como a nuevos espectadores.
Adem√°s, la habilidad de Marvel Studios para equilibrar acci√≥n espectacular con desarrollo de personajes s√≥lido ha sido clave para su √©xito. La inclusi√≥n de elementos humor√≠sticos, emocionales y de aventura ha ampliado la accesibilidad de las pel√≠culas, atrayendo a un p√∫blico diverso. La elecci√≥n de talentosos directores y actores, as√≠ como la adaptaci√≥n creativa de arcos narrativos ic√≥nicos de los c√≥mics, ha permitido que el MCU evolucione y se mantenga relevante a lo largo del tiempo. En √∫ltima instancia, la combinaci√≥n de un enfoque narrativo innovador, personajes carism√°ticos y una calidad cinematogr√°fica consistente ha consolidado el MCU como una franquicia cinematogr√°fica sin precedentes en la historia del entretenimiento.
No hablo de What If...? mucho porque realmente no he sido fan√°tico del programa, pero "¬øY si... Kahhori reformara el mundo?" Fue bastante genial.
I don't talk about "What If...?" a lot because I haven't really been a fan of the show but "What If... Kahhori Reshaped the World?" was pretty dope.
pic.twitter.com/7ywxfcFfrb
‚Äî Wednesday Pull (@WednesdayPull) December 28, 2023
La representaci√≥n ind√≠gena de todos en todas las formas de asuntos medi√°ticos importa. MCU lo sac√≥ del parque al crear a Kahhori e involucrar a los Mohawk en su creaci√≥n.
Yalll Indigenous representation in all forms of media matters. MCU knocked it out of the park by creating Kahhori and involving Mohawk in her creation. pic.twitter.com/0YeiGgrIuf
‚Äî Anita LandBack (@AnitaLandback) December 27, 2023
¬°El episodio de Kahhori de #WhatIfS2 es bueno! ¬°As√≠ es como presentas a un personaje!
The Kahhori episode from #WhatIfS2 is good! That's how you introduce a character! pic.twitter.com/PEGNwGIWww
‚Äî Kulas üáµüá∏ (@kulascoded) December 27, 2023
El WHAT IF‚Ä¶? De hoy, QUE. PUTA. BELLEZA!!!
Justo lo que debi√≥ pasar en el mundo.
Kahhori, te amo. pic.twitter.com/iW7uGmu4qg
‚Äî Samy At The Disco (@SamyATD) December 27, 2023
Muy chulo #WhatIfSeason2 hoy. Siempre es dif√≠cil jug√°rsela creando personajes con Kahhori les ha salido un origen bastante inspirador, ayudado por la puesta en escena.
P.D: Sorry x los 4 tontos que con Eternos y Wakanda Forever se picaron porque Marvel es "anti espa√±ola"(??) pic.twitter.com/SrJM8EkmO9

author: Redacci√≥n ILE√ìN
title: Genar√≠n obra un nuevo milagro y evita la lluvia para que miles de devotos le rindan homenaje
text:
Miles de personas han secundado un a√±o m√°s la procesi√≥n del Entierro de Genar√≠n en la ciudad de Le√≥n la madrugada de Jueves a Viernes Santo, una 'religi√≥n' que recuerda la figura real de Genaro (o Jenaro) Blanco, un pellejero atropellado por un cami√≥n en la ma√±ana de Viernes Santo y cuyos amigos convirtieron en un icono de los vividores y de la transgresi√≥n contra los poderes de la √©poca. Hace 95 a√±os fallec√≠a y con √©l el mito de sus haza√±as como borrach√≠n de la ciudad leonesa, que los Cuatro Evangelistas empezaron a divulgar cada Semana Santa, en una procesi√≥n pagana que se hizo multitudinaria hasta que en 1958 fue prohibida hasta la llegada de la democracia, por las protestas de pr√≥ceres franquistas como el Periodista Lamparilla que tiene todav√≠a hoy una calle en Le√≥n.
Este 2024 la multitud genariana ha sido menor a la de a√±os venideros aunque Genar√≠n ha obrado el milagro de interrumpir la incesante lluvia de la jornada para poder salir, cosa que no pudieron hacer las procesiones cat√≥licas previstas para el Jueves Santo. La desapacible jornada ha influido sin duda en una menor asistencia que no ha impedido llenar la Plaza del Grano y buena parte del recorrido.
El final del Entierro de Genar√≠n, habitualmente en la carretera de los Cubos donde fue atropellado, ha sido m√°s deslucido ya que se ha retransmitido en directo hasta Puerta Castillo como el hermano colgador sub√≠a la tradicional ofrenda de una corona, orujo, naranjas, pan y queso. En la plaza el poeta Ignacio Fern√°ndez ley√≥ sus versos ganadores del XII Certamen Genariano de Versos Burlescos, cumpliendo la tradici√≥n de poner iron√≠a y actualidad a la celebraci√≥n genariana.
La procesi√≥n genariana estuvo marcada por el buen humor, el orujo y el homenaje al personaje inmortalizado para siempre por el ilustre escritor leon√©s Julio Llamazares, aunque mito y realidad hist√≥rica choquen. La 'devoci√≥n' de miles de personas a Genar√≠n y al orujo es una realidad incontestable a√±o a a√±o, a la que la lluvia no impide salir y solo la pandemia, y la amenaza de represi√≥n franquista, logr√≥ interrumpir. Porque la 'copina de orujo' en la memoria de Genaro Blanco es siempre m√°s que una necesidad.
